packages.title: Packages
packages.clickToCheck: Click check to find available updates
packages.noUpdates: No updates available. Click "Check for Updates" to scan for new versions.
packages.searchTips: Tip: Use @ for version (package@version), exact: for exact match
packages.uninstallConfirm: Are you sure you want to uninstall {name}? This action cannot be undone.
packages.installConfirm: Are you sure you want to install {name}?
packages.allUpToDate: All packages are up to date!
packages.installHistoryDesc: View recent package installations and updates
packages.processingDesc: This may take a few moments
packages.exportImportDesc: Export your installed packages list or import packages from a file
packages.exportAsJsonDesc: Download complete package list with versions and providers
packages.exportToClipboardDesc: Copy package names to clipboard as plain text
packages.selectFileDesc: Import packages from a previously exported JSON file
packages.enterPackageToResolve: Enter a package name to resolve dependencies
packages.allPackagesUpToDate: All packages are up to date!
packages.updateCheckSummary: Checked {checked} packages across {providers} providers, found {updates} update(s)

providers.title: Providers
providers.noProvidersDesc: No package providers are registered in the system.
providers.noResultsDesc: Try adjusting your search query or filters to find providers.
providers.checkStatusDesc: Check if this provider is available on the system
providers.checkAllStatusDesc: Check availability status for all providers
providers.infoText: Providers are adapters that connect CogniaLauncher to various package managers and environment tools. Each provider handles specific functionality:
providers.infoEnvironmentDesc: nvm, pyenv, rustup, phpbrew, dotnet - Manage runtime versions with multi-version support and project-local configuration.
providers.infoJsPackageDesc: npm, pnpm, yarn, bun - Manage Node.js packages globally with version locking and update checking.
providers.infoPyPackageDesc: pip, uv, poetry - Python package management with virtual environment support and dependency resolution.
providers.infoRustPackageDesc: Cargo - Install and manage Rust crates and binary packages.
providers.infoRubyPackageDesc: Bundler - Manage Ruby gems and dependencies with Gemfile support.
providers.infoPhpPackageDesc: Composer - PHP dependency management with Packagist integration.
providers.infoDotnetPackageDesc: .NET SDK - Manage NuGet packages and .NET SDK versions with global.json support.
providers.infoSystemDesc: apt, Homebrew, winget, Scoop, Chocolatey - Interface with OS-level package managers for system software.
providers.infoCppDesc: vcpkg - Manage C/C++ libraries across platforms.
providers.infoContainerDesc: Docker - Manage container images with pull, list, and update functionality.
providers.infoPowershellDesc: PSGallery - Install and manage PowerShell modules from the gallery.
providers.infoCustomDesc: GitHub - Fetch and install packages from GitHub releases.
providers.infoWslDesc: Windows Subsystem for Linux - Install, manage, and configure Linux distributions on Windows.

cache.title: Cache
cache.clearConfirmDesc: This will remove all cached files. Downloaded packages will need to be re-downloaded.
cache.clearDownloadConfirmDesc: This will remove all downloaded package files. They will need to be re-downloaded when needed.
cache.clearMetadataConfirmDesc: This will remove all cached metadata. Package information will be re-fetched when needed.
cache.clearAllConfirmDesc: This will remove all cached data including downloads and metadata. Everything will need to be re-downloaded.
cache.verifySuccess: Cache verification complete - no issues found
cache.maxSizeDesc: Maximum cache storage size in MB
cache.resolveStrategyDesc: How versions are resolved when multiple are available
cache.autoUpdateMetadataDesc: Automatically refresh package metadata in the background
cache.previewDesc: The following {type} files will be cleaned
cache.useTrashDesc: Files will be moved to system trash and can be recovered later
cache.permanentDeleteDesc: Files will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered
cache.hitRateDesc: Percentage of cache requests that found cached data
cache.browseEntriesDesc: View and manage individual cache entries
cache.warningHigh: Cache usage is at {percent}%. Consider cleaning up to free space.
cache.warningCritical: Cache usage is critical at {percent}%! Clean up immediately to avoid issues.
cache.externalCachesDesc: Manage caches from package managers and development tools
cache.noExternalCaches: No external caches found or no tools installed
cache.externalCleanAllDesc: This will clean caches from {count} package managers. This action cannot be undone.
cache.sizeMonitorDesc: Real-time cache size monitoring and threshold alerts
cache.thresholdExceeded: Cache usage ({percent}%) exceeds threshold ({threshold}%). Auto-cleanup will trigger.
cache.pathManagementDesc: View and manage cache storage location
cache.migrationDesc: Move cache data to a new location
cache.migrationModeMoveDesc: Move files to new location and update config path
cache.migrationModeMoveAndLinkDesc: Move files and create symlink at original location
cache.migrationSuccess: Cache migration completed successfully! Moved {size} ({count} files)
cache.forceCleanDesc: Force clean all internal caches (ignores age/size limits)
cache.forceCleanConfirmDesc: This will delete ALL cached data regardless of age or size limits. This cannot be undone.
cache.forceCleanExternalConfirm: Force clean {provider} cache? This will use direct deletion to remove all cached files.
cache.autoCleanThresholdDesc: Trigger auto-cleanup when cache usage exceeds this percentage (0 = disabled)
cache.monitorIntervalDesc: How often to check cache size (seconds, 0 = disabled)
cache.monitorExternalDesc: Include external tool caches in monitoring
cache.externalPathsDesc: Detailed path information for all external cache providers

settings.title: Settings
settings.minInstallSpaceDesc: Minimum free disk space required for installations (MB)
settings.resolveStrategyDesc: How package versions are resolved when multiple versions are available
settings.autoUpdateMetadataDesc: Automatically refresh package metadata in the background
settings.cacheMaxSizeDesc: Maximum cache storage size in bytes (default: 5 GB)
settings.cacheMaxAgeDaysDesc: Number of days before cache entries expire and get cleaned up
settings.autoCleanCacheDesc: Automatically clean expired cache entries when limits are exceeded
settings.cacheAutoCleanThresholdDesc: Trigger auto-cleanup when cache usage exceeds this percentage (0 = disabled)
settings.cacheMonitorIntervalDesc: How often to check cache size in seconds (0 = disabled)
settings.cacheMonitorExternalDesc: Include external tool caches (npm, pip, cargo, etc.) in size monitoring
settings.downloadSpeedLimitDesc: Maximum download speed in bytes/sec (0 = unlimited)
settings.proxyDesc: HTTP proxy URL (leave empty to disable)
settings.verifyCertsDesc: Validate SSL/TLS certificates for secure connections
settings.allowSelfSignedDesc: Allow self-signed certificates for trusted internal networks
settings.mirrorsDesc: Configure package registry mirrors for faster downloads
settings.npmRegistryDesc: NPM package registry URL (for npm, pnpm, yarn)
settings.pypiIndexDesc: Python package index URL (for pip, uv)
settings.goProxyDesc: Go module proxy URL (for Go modules)
settings.mirrorVerifySslDesc: Verify TLS certificates for this mirror
settings.appearanceDesc: Customize the look and feel of the application
settings.themeDesc: Choose between light, dark, or system theme
settings.accentColorDesc: Choose the primary accent color for the interface
settings.chartColorThemeDesc: Choose the color scheme for dashboard charts
settings.reducedMotionDesc: Disable animations and transitions for accessibility
settings.checkUpdatesOnStartDesc: Automatically check for updates when the app starts
settings.autoInstallUpdatesDesc: Automatically download and install updates when available
settings.notifyOnUpdatesDesc: Show a notification when updates are available
settings.minimizeToTrayDesc: Minimize to system tray instead of closing the application
settings.startMinimizedDesc: Start the application minimized to system tray
settings.autostartDesc: Automatically start the application when your computer starts
settings.showNotificationsDesc: Display system notifications for important events
settings.trayClickBehaviorDesc: Action when left-clicking the tray icon
settings.pathCacheDesc: Directory for downloaded packages and metadata

pathValidation.mustBeAbsolute: Path must be an absolute path (e.g. C:\Users\... or /home/...)
pathValidation.traversalWarning: Path contains directory traversal (..) segments — use with caution

settings.disabledProvidersHint: Changes apply after restarting the app
settings.appearanceConfigInvalid: Invalid appearance settings found in config: {fields}. Defaults applied.
settings.invalidTheme: Invalid theme value. Please select a valid theme.
settings.resetConfirmDesc: This will reset all settings to their default values. This action cannot be undone.
settings.validationError: Please fix validation errors before saving
settings.shortcutHint: Press Ctrl+S to save, Esc to discard

errors.config: Configuration error. Check your settings file.
errors.provider: Version manager error. Try reinstalling it.
errors.providerNotFound: Version manager not found. Install nvm, pyenv, or rustup first.
errors.packageNotFound: Package not found. Verify the name and try again.
errors.versionNotFound: Version not found. Check available versions.
errors.versionNotInstalled: Version not installed. Install it first.
errors.resolution: Dependency resolution failed. Try updating packages.
errors.conflict: Dependency conflict detected. Review your dependencies.
errors.installation: Installation failed. Check disk space and try again.
errors.checksumMismatch: Download corrupted. Clear cache and retry.
errors.network: Network error. Check your internet connection.
errors.database: Cache database error. Try clearing cache.
errors.internal: Unexpected error. Please report this issue.
errors.unknown: An error occurred. Check logs for details.

wsl.noDistrosDesc: Install a Linux distribution to get started with WSL.
wsl.unregisterConfirm: Are you sure you want to unregister '{name}'? All data will be permanently lost.

wsl.importDesc: Import a distribution from a tar or vhdx file

pathManagement.description: Manage the shim directory in your system PATH

pathManagement.addCommandDescription: Run this command to manually add the shim directory to PATH
pathManagement.restartRequired: You may need to restart your terminal for changes to take effect

onboarding.wizardDesc: Let's get CogniaLauncher set up for you
onboarding.welcomeDesc: Your all-in-one environment and package manager. Let's walk through a quick setup to get you started.
onboarding.welcomeHint: This will only take a minute
onboarding.languageDesc: Select your preferred language. You can change this anytime in Settings.
onboarding.themeDesc: Pick a look that suits you. This can be changed later in Settings.
onboarding.envDetectionDesc: We'll scan your system for installed development tools and runtimes.
onboarding.envWebModeNote: Full detection is available in the desktop app. Web mode shows limited results.
onboarding.mirrorsDesc: Choose a mirror preset for faster package downloads based on your region.
onboarding.mirrorsChinaPresetDesc: Use optimized mirrors for faster access in China
onboarding.mirrorsCustomDesc: Configure mirrors manually in Settings later
onboarding.mirrorsHint: You can fine-tune mirror settings anytime in Settings > Mirrors.
onboarding.shellDesc: Add CogniaLauncher to your shell PATH so managed tools are available globally.
onboarding.shellHint: Paste this into your shell config file, then restart your terminal. You can also set this up later via Settings > Paths.
onboarding.completeDesc: CogniaLauncher is ready to use. Explore the dashboard or take a quick guided tour.
onboarding.completeHint: Click Finish to start using the app
onboarding.tourSidebarDesc: Access all major sections from here: Dashboard, Environments, Packages, Downloads, and more.
onboarding.tourDashboardDesc: Your overview at a glance. Drag to rearrange widgets or click Customize to add/remove them.
onboarding.tourEnvironmentsDesc: Manage runtime versions for Node.js, Python, Rust, Go, and many more.
onboarding.tourPackagesDesc: Search, install, and update packages from multiple providers in one place.
onboarding.tourCommandPaletteDesc: Press Ctrl+K to quickly search and navigate anywhere in the app.
onboarding.tourSettingsDesc: Configure mirrors, themes, paths, providers, and all other preferences here.
